Package org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.plant

Plant is a singleton that supports one or more reactors.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PlantScheduler
    A scheduler for Plant, created by PlantConfiguration.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultPlantScheduler
    The default plantScheduler created by PlantConfiguration.
    DefaultReactorPoolThreadFactory
    Base class used to create the pool threads used by reactors.
    DelayAReq
    Returns a result after a delay.
    Plant
    Plant is a singleton and is the top-level object.
    PlantConfiguration
    Base class for configuring the Plant.
    ReactorPoolThread
    Base class for pool threads used by reactors.
    ReactorPoolThreadManager
    The ReactorPoolThreadManager is used to process a queue of Reactor's that have non-empty inboxes.
    Recovery
    Base class for managing failure detection and recovery.

Package org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.plant Description

Plant is a singleton that supports one or more reactors. Plant takes its name from manufacturing plant, with the reactors performing the application processing. A plant consists of a configuration, a recovery strategy, a scheduler, a thread pool and an internal reactor.

Related Tutorial Pages

  • Getting Started -- See system properties Debug and Configuration
  • Recovery - When failures occur
  • Delays - Scalable Timers
